properties.name: spring.pulsar.producer.block-if-queue-full
properties.description: Whether to block if the outgoing message queue is full.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.producer.batching-max-messages
properties.description: Maximum number of messages in a batch.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.producer-map
properties.description: Multiple producer configurations mapped by name.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.dead-topic
properties.description: Dead letter topic for messages that exceed retry limit.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.business-key
properties.description: Business key field name for message differentiation.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.subscription-type
properties.description: Default subscription type for consumers (Exclusive, Shared, Failover, Key_Shared).

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.retry-time
properties.description: Number of retry attempts for failed messages.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.receiver-queue-size
properties.description: Size of the consumer receive queue.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.negative-ack-redelivery-delay
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds for redelivery of negatively acknowledged messages.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.time-to-reconsume-delay
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds for message redelivery.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer.auto-ack-oldest-chunked-message-on-queue-full
properties.description: Whether to automatically acknowledge oldest chunked message when queue is full.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.consumer-map
properties.description: Multiple consumer configurations mapped by name.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.client.num-io-threads
properties.description: Number of IO threads for the client.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.client.num-listener-threads
properties.description: Number of listener threads for the client.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.transaction.buffer-snapshot-segment-size
properties.description: Transaction buffer snapshot segment size in bytes.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.transaction.buffer-snapshot-min-time-in-millis
properties.description: Minimum time interval for transaction buffer snapshots.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.transaction.buffer-snapshot-max-transaction-count
properties.description: Maximum transaction count for buffer snapshots.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.transaction.log-store-size
properties.description: Transaction log store size in bytes.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.retry.initial-delay
properties.description: Initial delay for retry in milliseconds.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.retry.max-delay
properties.description: Maximum delay for retry in milliseconds.

properties.name: spring.pulsar.retry.use-random-delay
properties.description: Whether to use random delay for retries to avoid thundering herd.

values.description: Only one consumer can connect to the subscription.
Multiple consumers can connect to the same subscription.
Multiple consumers can connect but only one receives messages.
Multiple consumers can connect and messages with the same key go to the same consumer.
Start consuming from the latest message.
Start consuming from the earliest available message.
